SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.Listeners

Class ListenersManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.Listeners.ListenersManager
public class ListenersManager extends Object
This class manages listeners of other classes. Listeners can dynamically register and unregister themselves from it.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final HashMap<ListenerType,ArrayList<Listener>>
    attachedListeners
    Attached listeners: for every type of listeners in ListenerType there is a List<Listener> of listeners that must implement the correct interface for that type
